# Board Info

The Talent Urban Renewal Agency Board consists of the Talent City Council

- Chair: Darby Ayers-Flood
- Member seat 1: Colette Paré-Miller
- Member seat 2: Ana Byers
- Member seat 3: David Pastizzo
- Member seat 4: Rosario Medina
- Member seat 5: Eleanor Ponomareff
- Member seat 6: Daniel Collay

[Print](https://www.cityoftalent.org/print/pdf/node/5338)
